Package com.simplechat.server

Class Summary
ClientKeepAliveSendThread Thread which sends keep alive packets to client.
ClientKeepAliveThread Thread for client ping timeout, gets reset when a keep alive packet is received.
CommandHandler Handles commands sent by clients through chat.
ConfigManager Server configuration manager, for reading the configuration file.
DataManager Data manager, handles ops/bans and such.
PacketHandlerThread Thread which handles packets sent from clients.
Server SimpleChat server main class.
ServerListenerThread Thread which listens for packets sent by clients.
ServerShutdownThread Thread started on server shutdown, kicks all users with a "Server shutting down." message.
